nodes.text: KOTOR Campaign Guide Web Enhancement 9: Urban Bombardier Speeder Bike

KOTOR Campaign Guide Web Enhancement 9 : Urban Bombadier Speeder Bike was an online supplement for Star Wars Roleplaying Game. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on November 25, 2008 and was the ninth in the series of web enhancements, which present material that didn't made it into Knights of the Old Republic Campaign Guide because of space reasons. This article gave information of the Urban Bombadier speeder bike, a type of speeder bike that was made by the Aratech Corporation and used by the Galactic Republic during the Mandalorian Wars.
